description:
We are running this event for Porto Freelance community to come and grab a few beers, meet each other and network in a nice atmosphere overlooking Santa Catarina street :)

This edition we'll have as a theme "Future of Remote Work & How to Monetise While Roaming The World". A special event with three special guests: Epi Ludvik, Dren Luci, and Sebastian Kuehn.
Epi Ludvik is the Founder & CEO of Crowdsourcing Week, a global platform that is uniting thought leadership on the crowd economy. One of his latest ventures, GoGoPlaces (www.gogoplaces.co), is just an example of the level of passion and commitment to make a positive impact in the world.
Dren is one of the co-founders of GoGoPlaces, where he merges his passion for travel and experiencing new places, with his near obsession for streamlining and maximizing the use of all built environments.
Sebastian is a digital nomad who has lived in Asia for six years before coming to beautiful Porto. In 2014, he launched Wireless Life, one of the best-known websites for digital nomads in Germany, and he's also co-founder of Citizen Circle (www.citizencircle.de), an online community for location-independent entrepreneurs. Today, he earns his living as an author, consultant and event-organizer.

The panel of discussion will allow you to share your personal experiences and learn with the speakers, some tips to monetise while you are abroad.

We would be very happy if you could contribute with something to our donation box! :)
name: Future of Remote Work & How to Monetise While Roaming The World
